bug.author: vxgu86
bug.summary: different metrics measure of airsim and ue4.18.3
bug.description: for example, the wall in UE measure is 3meters, but the multi rotor flying over the wall with y=-2.4xxxx what is the problem, I searched the issues without colclusion.

comments.comment: Closed due to age and incompleteness. Please feel free to open a new issue if you still have this problem, and include the following (as requested when opening a bug issue) *Make sure to write all reproduction steps *Include full error message in text form *Search issues for error message before filing issue *Attach screenshot if applicable *Include code to run if applicable Thanks!
